name: The Adventures of Billy Bob Jones the Life-Force Guy
name_original: The Adventures of Billy Bob Jones the Life-Force Guy
description:
The Adventures of Billy Bob Jones is a silly platformer about a a cloaked figure who needs to extract the life-force of others in order to make himself more powerful.  This game was made for the Ludum Dare 44 Jam, and unfortunately had to have many features scrapped due to computer issues and being busy.  SquirreI created the Art, and most of the Level Design, while YellowZombie did the rest.  (Even though YellowZombie is more familiar with level design than SquirreI.)

Controls:
Left Arrow and A = Left

Right Arrow and D = Right

E = Shoot

F = Buy From Shop (Signs)

Up Arrow and Space = Jump
